trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides data for events that can be handled completely in an event handler.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the event handler has completely handled the event or whether the system should continue its own processing.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the event has been completely handled; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
